oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Roberts and his dog Rover
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: John Roberts and his dog Rover. Roberts is seated on a kitchen cabinet he had made, holding a rifle across his lap. Childhood home of Milia Creech can be seen in the background. Typed description on reverse.
Milia Creech married C.A. Nelson at age 16 and was related to the Tolivers, who were the model for the family in the film "Trail of the Lonesome Pine."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Men; Dogs; Rifles; Houses
